name: Gracenote Update File
summary: An UP file is an update for Gracenote technology, which is available on select Toyota vehicle models and audio systems to help drivers manage their music. It contains information about a database update that adds features, bug fixes, etc., to the Gracenote system. Users should not attempt to open UP files; instead, they load them with the Gracenote system included in select Toyota models.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
